review: I'll be honest with you... that's what you want anyways, right? Amazon's Fire TV Stick is my favorite add-on to my television since the blu ray player.Not only does this product let you take advantage of your Prime subscription content, it also let's you expand beyond with apps and screen mirroring functionalities. My favorite part about the Fire Stick is that I have had great streaming experiences with this product. I was streaming Amazon Prime through my Nintendo Wii, but the playback lagged at times and was grainy beyond a bad YouTube resolution. The Fire TV Stick seems to have figured out how to juice my slow network speed to deliver incredible content.A final word- I actually bought another one of these for another room in my house... that is how much I like this device.If you are one the fence, I say go for it. You will not be disappointed nor out of much money at all.
author: Kyle

review: We are enjoying our 30 day free trial of amazon prime, the firestick is a wonderful experience. We will definately be ordering amazon prime. What a deal for a year for $100. Will be worth it. Don't miss cable at all!!
author: shirley kabalka

review: I have had nothing but problems since installing the Fire Stick!  It constantly freezes up or locks up and the only recourse is to reset the router.  I have a Roku on another TV and a Chromecast on my daughter's TV and both of these perform flawlessly.  I am really frustrated with this item as it's almost impossible to watch a complete show or movie without it locking up and having to reset the router in order to finish my show.  I would have returned it, but I kept thinking that it was just a glitch and that it would get better as it broke in.  If it continues, I will be looking at replacing it with another Roku that I know will work properly!  Totally regret this purchase.  I had high expectations only to be disillusioned by Amazon's colorful description.
